about_the_game:
Your ticket has arrived - and it's inviting you to the Mind Garden!

Your Summer day 🌤️

You are plopped into the garden with an agenda outlined in your journal, reminiscent of a day at summer camp. Your goal is to fill this journal by completing various tasks and activities. Each completed activity earns you a receipt of your participation, whether it be stickers, memos, photos, or even audio recordings! From there, you are free to design the journal and take on more tasks. Some activities you might run into:

  • Preparing a picnic

  • Stopping the tomato from trampling the flowers

  • Removing the weed infestation

  • Tracking down where the dog went

  • Finding where the eery noise is coming from

  • Bringing soup to a sick carrot

  • Writing letters to Mom

Designing🖼️🌷

The journal and garden are yours to design. Plant flowers, place new stickers, lay paths, paint pages, and more!

Art Style✍️

A blend of crayon art and real-life photos - innocence juxtaposed with photographs, with other mediums to be discovered as the story progresses.

Deeper Meaning

  • Discover the many metaphors up for interpretation

  • An allegory for the modern world

  • Find God's face

Live through a delightfully short experience (~2 hours) that will stick with you. Will you find your way out of the garden? And should you?
